trends: There have been no other sightings in Ute
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very large and quiet object passed over and discharged something green
divs: sighting detailsthe date and time are approximate. i just remember it being winter and late at night. on said night, a friend and i were driving home from a party. i decided to let my friend drive my car on the gravels since he didn't have a license yet and needed some practice before taking the test. we drove north out of ute and decided we had taken a wrong road. we pulled into a cemetary lane to turn around. when my friend place the transmission in reverse the car died. this is something that has never happened before or after the incident. my friend was a bit weirded out, being superstitious and the car died on him in the cemetary! he relaxed for a second then started up the car. we turned back to the south and at the first intersection made a right and traveled west up the road and stopped at the top of the hill. i asked him to stop so i could get out and relieve myself. when i got back in the car i decided to put a new tape in (i owned a car made in 1988). and thats when things got really weird. the radio wouldnt stop scanning and there was no sound. odd. i looked over at my friend who was still in the driver's seat. i tried to open my mouth to ask 'know anything about car stereos?', but i was interrupted when he put up his hand. he was sitting forward up against the wheel, glaring into the sky. i looked forward, then looked up. i couldn't beleive what i saw. something very large, low flying, and what i would call fairly slow flying began blocking out the stars and moving out in front of the car. it took up about 3\4 of my front windshield. it was flying almost due west. we both just watched silently in total awe. this thing was clearly not a normal aircraft. it had an extrememly wide wingspan. i dont recall it actually having wings, just being very wide across and a bit shorter than width from forward to aft. it had several blinking lights to include red, orange, blue. no green. no beacon. the lights flashed in a strange order. as a matter of fact i couldn't even make out a 'firing order' of the lights. after we watched this thing move out farther west than hwy 141 (the hwy turns north for a bit just outside of ute), something green came down from it. at first i thought, 'okay its a commercial aircraft dumping its lavatory'. but wait. it can't be that. it's glowing in the night sky. last time i heard, that green slime in an airplane lavatory doesn't glow in the dark. the object slowly moved out of sight continuing westward. it was then that my friend finally was able to speak. 'jesus christ did you see that?' suddenly the tape i had put in began playing. and we decided to go home. i have since served almost 5 years in a career that deals with aircraft of all kinds. i've seen them all at night, during the day, during twilight hours. most of the time i see them from afar approaching the runway. i have never seen anything like what i saw that night. the experience is something that i have been able to remember in great detail just because it was so awesome.
